  3. Son Jin Wook

Son Jin Wook

Korean: 손진욱

Hometown:

Daegu

Country:

South Korea

Birthday:
Mar 17, 1995
Age:
30 years old
Height:
5'6" (167 cm)

Introduction

Son Jin Wook is a rock singer, known for his wide vocal range, versatility and incredibly powerful high-pitches. He's the vocalist of a 5-member alternative rock/metal band DANGGISIO that debuted in 2015 with the single "Rope" and later released two EPs: "Moonlight" and "Last Dream".

In 2021 Jinwook participated in a "Superband 2" survival show but was eliminated by judges in the second round, causing a strong backlash from viewers.
Later the same year he tried his chances in another survival show: "Kookmin Singer" (Tomorrow's National Singer) with much better results. Even though producers also weren't favorable to him, he charmed the audience again, advanced to the finals and placed 7th, which gave him the opportunity to make his solo debut with a single "Paradigm" and become a regular singer of "The Country Calls" TV CHOSUN's show for over a year. Thanks to singing a variety of songs requested by audience he developed his singing abilities even further and widened the range of music genres he's proficient in.
At the end of 2022, he also won in the King of Mask Singer mystery music show (ep. 186-190).

While he started his solo activities, his official fancafe named "At The Sparkling" was created. Jinwook's official fans are called "Klings". In 2023 he also created an official YouTube channel, with his new original solo music and a lot of song covers.
Currently he works as a DJ in BTN RADIO "Mate ON" broadcast. In 2024 he released four original solo songs and debuted as a musical actor taking the role of Santiago in "Natural Born Idiots" rock musical, based on a manhwa of the same title.
